name: Legends of Aksara Jawa
description:
Forge your bond with your companions in this fantasy turn-based combat RPG with the future chaos from the rise of an ancient evil. Destiny at your hand, choose Rebirth Son of Gods or the dark side Divine Child of Rejuvenation with each of them must travel across the timeline to restore the "Crystal", which is the key to preserving the time.


  • Immersive Realm - A world with a classic storyline that will delight both veterans and fresh RPG fans, played with advanced interactions, visual effects, and a variety of dungeons.
  • Awaken The Summoning Power - Summon the Mythology Creatures, awakens summons skill with defeated boss and the hidden boss monster inside the adventure, and release their power!
  • Exploration Travel Through Time - Journey to the forgotten past, the present day, the far future, and the end of time with adventures, puzzles, and secrets to discover.
  • Strengthen The Bonds - Recruit Characters and build a friendship with your companion from adventure to discover powerful combination abilities, each with their own effects.
  • Strategic Planning - Configure your characters’ skills into a combo with some state effects that reaches their maximum potential inside the battles.
  • Classic Turn-Based Gameplay - Classically inspired turn-based combat with random enemy encounters, made amusing
  • Character Driven - Customize heroes with unique stances and techniques and all playable characters follow the typical “Job Class” style.
